Video Cloud Basics: Determining Which Videos Have the Most Views

In this topic you will learn how to find out which videos have the most views. A video view is counted as soon as a video begins playback.
 

Steps

  1. In Video Cloud Studio, open the Analytics module. The Performance report will display.
  2. To specify the time period for the report, click on a quick date at the top of the page or use the calendar control.
  3. Select to view the Performance by Video dimension.
  4. Click on the Video Views column to sort the data.

The search field at the top of the page can be used to search for a specific video.
